    <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
        var iBreadcrumbHideDelay = 1000;
        var delayHide = null;
        function getOffsetLeft(obj) {
            var totLeft = obj.offsetLeft;
            var o = obj.offsetParent;
            while (o != null) {
                totLeft += o.offsetLeft;
                o = o.offsetParent;
            }
            return totLeft;
        }
        function getOffsetTop(obj) {
            var totTop = obj.offsetTop;
            var o = obj.offsetParent;
            while (o != null) {
                totTop += o.offsetTop;
                o = o.offsetParent;
            }
            return totTop;
        }
        function openBreadCrumb(obj, e) {

            if (window.event) event.cancelBubble = true;
            else if (e.stopPropagation) e.stopPropagation();
            clearHideBC();
            oBrdCrm = document.getElementById ? document.getElementById("divBC") : divBC;
            oBrdCrm.style.left = getOffsetLeft(obj) + 20 + "px";
            oBrdCrm.style.top = getOffsetTop(obj) + 25 + "px";
            oBrdCrm.style.visibility = "visible";
            delayHideBC();
        }
        function closeBreadCrumb() {
            document.getElementById("divBC").style.visibility = "hidden";
        }
        function delayHideBC() {
            if (delayHide == null || delayHide == "undefined") {
                delayHide = setTimeout("closeBreadCrumb()", iBreadcrumbHideDelay);
            }
            else {
                clearTimeout(delayHide);
                delayHide = setTimeout("closeBreadCrumb()", 1000);
            }
        }
        function clearHideBC() {
            if (typeof delayHide != "undefined") {
                clearTimeout(delayHide);
            }
        }
        function buyMoreTime() {
            clearTimeout(delayHide);
            delayHide = setTimeout("closeBreadCrumb()", iBreadcrumbHideDelay + 1000);
        }



    </script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    var iHideDelayLM = 1000;
    var bDelayHideLM = null;
    var bInLM = false;
    var loginChecker = null;

    function getOffsetLeft(obj) {
        var totLeft = obj.offsetLeft;
        var o = obj.offsetParent;
        while (o != null) {
            totLeft += o.offsetLeft;
            o = o.offsetParent;
        }
        return totLeft;
    }
    function getOffsetTop(obj) {
        var totTop = obj.offsetTop;
        var o = obj.offsetParent;
        while (o != null) {
            totTop += o.offsetTop;
            o = o.offsetParent;
        }
        return totTop;
    }
    function openLM(obj, e) {


        if (window.event) event.cancelBubble = true;
        else if (e.stopPropagation) e.stopPropagation();
        clearHideLM();

        oLM = document.getElementById ? document.getElementById("divLM") : divLM;
        oLM.style.left =  obj.offsetLeft + (obj.offsetWidth - oLM.offsetWidth ) + "px";
        oLM.style.top = getOffsetTop(obj) + 36 + "px";


        oLMain = document.getElementById("divLoginMain");
        if (oLMain) {
            
            // gold
            oLMain.style.backgroundColor = "#b59759";
        }
        
        oLM.style.visibility = "visible";


        delayHideLM();
        loginChecker = setInterval(function () { loginCloser() }, 3000);
    }



    function closeLM() {
        if (document.activeElement) {
            if (document.activeElement.name) {
                if (document.activeElement.name.indexOf("tbLoginName") > 0 || document.activeElement.name.indexOf("tbPassword") > 0) {
                    return;
                }
                else {
                    // attempt to close.
                }
            }
            else {
                // attempt to close.
            }
        }
        if (!bInLM)
        { 
            document.getElementById("divLM").style.visibility = "hidden";
            oLMain = document.getElementById("divLoginMain");
            if (oLMain) {
                oLMain.style.backgroundColor = "";
            }
            if (loginChecker) {
                clearInterval(loginChecker);
            }
        }
    }
    function loginCloser() {
        closeLM();
    }

    function delayHideLM() {
        if (bDelayHideLM == null || bDelayHideLM == "undefined") {
            bDelayHideLM = setTimeout("closeLM()", iHideDelayLM);
        }
        else {
            clearTimeout(delayHideLM);
            bDelayHideLM = setTimeout("closeLM()", 1000);
        }
    }
    function clearHideLM() {
        if (typeof bDelayHideLM != "undefined") {
            clearTimeout(bDelayHideLM);
            bInLM = false;
            closeLM();
        }
    }
    function buyMoreTimeLM() {
        return;  // skip it... delays getting too long
        
        clearTimeout(bDelayHideLM);
        bDelayHideLM = setTimeout("closeLM()", iHideDelayLM + 3000);
    }
    function setDivPositions() {

        return;

        oL = document.getElementById('divLeft');
        oM = document.getElementById('divMain');
        oR = document.getElementById('divRight');
        if (oL && oM && oR) {
            //oM.style.width = document.body.offsetWidth - oL.offsetWidth - oR.offsetWidth-30;

            if (document.body.clientWidth < 750) {
                oR.style.display = 'none';
            }
            else {
                oR.style.display = 'block';
            }
            if (oL.offsetHeight > oR.offsetHeight && oL.offsetHeight > oM.offsetHeight) {
                oR.style.height = oL.offsetHeight + 'px';
                oM.style.height = oL.offsetHeight + 'px';
            }
            else if (oM.offsetHeight > oR.offsetHeight && oM.offsetHeight > oL.offsetHeight) {
                oL.style.height = oM.offsetHeight + 'px';
                oR.style.height = oM.offsetHeight + 'px';
            }
            else {
                oL.style.height = oR.offsetHeight + 'px';
                oM.style.height = oR.offsetHeight + 'px';
            }
        }

    }
    function bannerLoginClickHandler() {
        if (document.getElementById("btnLogin2").value == "Login") {
            document.getElementById("lbLoginHelp").click();
        }
        else {
            ; // user is logged in, leave her here.
        }
    }

            oFrom.style.display = 'none';

    }
